Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png'}
{3: 'Camu wakes up under blinding lights. He sees nothing but an expanse of white. He can sense the clutter and several people around him, though.'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Are you...?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Doctor', 3: 'I suppose I count as a doctor. I will be operating on you to make you into a Construct.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "Construct... So you're making me a Construct?"}
{2: 'Doctor', 3: "Yes. You're not allowed to refuse, though.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Camu does not feel particularly aggressive anymore. He might have been tranquilized.'}
{3: 'He does not even react to the word "Kurono", though he does feel a bit surprised about the Construct part.'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Why are you doing this to me?'}
{2: 'Doctor', 3: "Because everyone else besides you died from the virus. You're the only human who's survived so far with the Punishing Virus in you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Not particularly enthused about being the exception, Camu tries to sit up, but soon realizes that his limbs have been tied down.'}
{3: 'The person who calls himself a doctor is busy with some tools, probably preparing for an operation.'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "...Where's my Master?"}
{2: 'Doctor', 3: "You mean Mao Zhen from Special Security? He died in the explosion. When we found him, his body was draped over you. Thanks to that, you weren't directly crushed.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Camu has no idea how to react. Before he can figure out why his mentor did that, a sharp pain jabs into his spine.'}
{2: 'Doctor', 3: "Don't move."}
{3: 'An icy liquid pours into his body. The operation is about to begin.'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Hey. Do whatever you want to me... Use me however you like... But promise me one thing.'}
{3: 'The doctor falls silent for a bit before putting the syringe aside.'}
{2: 'Doctor', 3: "Tell us. We'll see if we can work something out.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "I don't know much about science, but if you guys at Kurono can make humans into Constructs, surely you can alter memories too. Even create fake personas..."}
{2: 'Doctor', 3: 'We can indeed manipulate memories, but a "persona" requires a certain amount of memory data from real life...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'While you do your operation, can you replace my persona with a new one?'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "A persona that won't bother himself with anything complicating... A persona that can inspire courage in others..."}
{2: 'Doctor', 3: "What a coincidence... I wonder if it'll be a blessing or a curse. Camu... Kamui.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Doctor', 3: 'We\'ll do it. Shall we name the persona "Kamui"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "Kamui... sounds a bit silly, but I don't have the right to decide, yeah?"}
{3: "Camu can tell that the doctor's crew are cutting his body open from the liquid pouring out, though he cannot feel anything due to the anesthesia."}
{3: 'His heart is beating faster, cold sweat glistening on his skin.'}
{3: 'Even so, Camu ignores whatever is happening to him and starts thinking about "Kamui".'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "If I survive this, I'd like to see how you live through this world."}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Teach me how to love this world... Kamui.'}
